title: Increase the remake time to 5/10/15 minutes?
body: Has any body else been put into low priority que because of bad weather ruining connections or your load screen freezing up and only letting you rejoin the game just as your team votes on the remake without you? -.- I've gotten LPQ like 5 times now over 1 to 2 months. I'm starting to feel like somebody's abusing it. I'm going to stop trying to play now............................still freezing even though it's nice weather this morning and LoL keeps closing before I can even report any body. That Heirm match was weird as FOOOOOOOK. https://i.imgsafe.org/c70c4b1df6.jpg

replies.body:
for normal blind pick games, i dont see an issue with changing it to 5 min timers or even 10min. however for ranked i think 3 mins should be lowered to even 2 mins. 
normal games are for casual or fun playing where people can take it less seriously and if someone is slightly late to the game its not an issue. 
but during a ranked game i think if your computer/internet cant get you in for the start of the game. dont play ranked. your letting yourself and your team down. both high and low elo the start of the game can be crucial.
